description: [BackdoorDiplomacy](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0135) has obtained and used leaked malware, including DoublePulsar, EternalBlue, EternalRocks, and EternalSynergy, in its operations.(Citation: ESET BackdoorDiplomacy Jun 2021)

external_references.description: Adam Burgher. (2021, June 10). BackdoorDiplomacy: Upgrading from Quarian to Turian. Retrieved September 1, 2021
